title: The Storm: Sky Fighters (Russian)/Buka Ent.
description:
THE STORM: SKY FIGHTERS
an exellent 'space flier' action game from Russian BUKA Entertainment.

IN RUSSIAN!

BEST PERFORMANCE CONFIGURATION:

Processor PIII, Athlon 700 MHz & over;
Memory 128 & over;
Free space 1150 Mb;
OS W95/98/ME/2000/XP;
DirectX 8.1 supporting video;
mouse, stick

TCP/IP network-protocol for online gaming
